Description: Two Japanese corporations, Ajinomoto Co. Inc. and Daesang Japan Inc., and one Korean corporation, Cheil Jedang Corporation, agreed to plead guilty and pay criminal fines totaling more than $9 million for participating in a worldwide conspiracy to fix the prices of, and allocate customers for nucleotides, a food flavor enhancer.
